tool.name: Hammer
tool.discription: Used for striking nails or metals etc.

tool.name: Stright Blade Screw Driver
tool.discription: Used for driving in flathead screws

tool.name: Phlips head Screw Driver
tool.discription: Used for driving in philps head screws

tool.name: Hand Saw
tool.discription: Used for cutting many things including wood, plastic, and much more

tool.name: Wrench Set
tool.discription: Used for tightening bolts in many sizes

tool.name: Socket Set
tool.discription: Used for tighening bolts in many sizes and shapes, but in a quicker fashion

tool.name: Measuring Tape
tool.discription: Used for measuring the distance of something. Useful for measurments for cutting, shaping, etc.

tool.name: Axe
tool.discription: Used for cutting things with blunt force

tool.name: Pliers
tool.discription: Used for pulling nails, staples, screws out of things. Also useful for anything you need to get a grip on

tool.name: Leveler
tool.discription: Used for telling if a surface is level or not

tool.name: Pry bar
tool.discription: Used for prying something open and holding it open

tool.name: Staple Gun
tool.discription: Used for stapling things. You also need staples for this to be useful

tool.name: Chisel
tool.discription: Used for scraping and cutting wood, metal, or stone.

tool.name: Mallet
tool.discription: Used for driving dowels or chisels. Softer type of hammer with more surface area

tool.name: Utility Knife
tool.discription: Used for cutting things including plastic, banding, and anything you may need to cut with a knife. Comes with multiple blades

tool.name: Sandpaper
tool.discription: Used for metal or wood to soften edges, corners, and rough spots on the material
